Class VueTexte

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • fr.the_other_hat_trick.grenon_liu.vue.VueTexte
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable, java.util.Observer

    public class VueTexte
extends java.lang.Thread
implements java.util.Observer
    Allow to artificially play with the console and the interface, still without added rules Can only work when you come back the same turn you left
    Author:
    Grenon, Runkai
